meanings.sent1: I need to refilter the coffee to remove the grounds.
meanings.sent2: After pouring the juice, I realized I had to refilter it to remove the pulp.
meanings.sent3: My mom asked me to refilter the water, but I accidentally spilled it all over the counter!
meanings.sent4: The photographer had to refilter the image to enhance the colors before printing.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to refilter the oil before reusing it for frying to avoid a burnt taste.

meanings.definition: To pass through a filter again.
meanings.sent1: To make the juice clearer, you can refilter it through a fine mesh.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic had to refilter the oil to remove any remaining debris.
meanings.sent3: I tried to refilter the tea, but the filter got clogged with leaves!
meanings.sent4: The winemaker decided to refilter the wine to achieve a smoother texture.
meanings.sent5: Remember to refilter the water before drinking it to ensure it's clean and safe.
